website_summaries.verdict: A set of action-figure dolls perfect for imaginative playtime or collecting.
pros: The action figures are high quality and are clearly made with an attention to detail
Jack-Jack's signature big eyes are made from lenses (as opposed to being painted on) for a realistic look and depth
Both of the action figures have costumes made from fabric, which is a nice touch
cons: Expensive for action figures, but the detail and size make them worth the cost

customer_reviews.title: Umm...what on earth IS this?
customer_reviews.text: NOT FULLY POSABLE as the box says. The only thing you can move is his arms (at the shoulder and elbows). He can't move his waist, he can't bend his legs ..NOTHING. He can't even CARRY the Jack Jack that comes with him, which was REALLY pissing my kids off. Also Jack Jack doesn't have the same costume as the rest of family like he's supposed to..he just had a sparkly red jumpsuit, and doesn't have a mask either.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge and worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I can’t believe I only paid $8 for this toy! It’s huge and comes with baby Jack Jack! It’s so worth the money! My son loves it so much. It’s nice and sturdy and Mr. incredible’s outfit is so cool and shiny and it can come on and off. I will definitely be buying another one for other kids in my family this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Angela B

customer_reviews.title: awesome special
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a lightning special and I was pleasantly surprised at the size. I assumed for $5 it would be small, so I was surprised to receive the full size figures. My little grandson was extremely happy with his surprise gift.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lay

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys
customer_reviews.text: Great toys, Mr. Incredible is huge! We can't wait to see the new movie. Shipping was lighting fast, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J4A72

customer_reviews.title: This is not one of those dinky little toys that will fit in the palm of your hand.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Grandson for Christmas. He is a huge fan of anything from The Incredibles II movie. He is going to love this action figure set. He has the small ones and can only do so much with them. This is going to give him so many more adventures.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: The Incredible set is affordable and durable. Mr. Incredible is big and feels sturdy. Jack Jack is movable and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the incredibles, so I got her all of them for Christmas! She lives playing with these, while she’s playing with her Barbies.
customer_reviews.author: M D Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this. The size and quality were more than I expected. The only issue was the mask for Mr. Incredible wouldn't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly big
customer_reviews.text: Talk about BIG DADDY! Woah! It is a cartoon character though!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Incredibles
customer_reviews.text: My Baby Jack Jack loves these, as does my daughter. Mr Incredible is a little awkward, as he doesn’t really move. BJJ is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I bought these when they were around $7-$8. I had a very happy little boy when he received the item. Great quality for the price , the clothes are removeable. I would recommend these for any kid that is a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bigger in size than I thought it was going to be which I was happy with. It was a great deal, very well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Action
customer_reviews.text: Awesome action figure and I like how big he is! Only complaint is the mask will not stay on him and I’m pretty sure we’ve already lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Casuallyjoyfulpeach

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very loved toy. Big and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dolls
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered Mr. Incredible and Jack Jack already had Edna these dolls are great for children and collectors great for Christmas or birthday presents.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: Great toys, product as shown. The masks do notbattach very well though. It is a type of sticky material that sticks multiple times but does not adhere well. Overall I would recommend but unless you have older children who do not lose things i would recommend putting the masks back in storage.
customer_reviews.author: First Time Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. But I mean.. you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lateefa S.

customer_reviews.title: True to size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son age 8 loved these and plays all day
customer_reviews.author: ALines

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how big and detailed these are. For this price. My son wont go anywhere with out them . Super worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Mr Incredible and Jack Jack. She is thrilled to have Jack Jack.
customer_reviews.author: Krisweiner

customer_reviews.title: Big and look great!
customer_reviews.text: I got Mr. Incredibles and Jack Jack. They are much bigger than expected. Mr. Incredible’s glasses will get lost in 5 seconds but they are still worth it without. Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: "Very well durable constructed"
customer_reviews.text: "Great" durable constructed, the price was right! Great for a collectible item for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, love that he's he bends and wearing the same shining outfit as his wife and Volilet
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal on this set. It is a good size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love how Mr. Incredible and jak jak figures look. Can't wait for my kids to open it up to play with them this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great grandson and he loves them! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy the limbs are broke off within days
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Huge and came in perfect condition! I wasnt expecting much for $9 but I would buy 10 more if I could!

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter and 5 year old nephew loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these ! He plays rough has thrown them down the stairs and easy to clean after he covers them with dirt.

customer_reviews.title: good service
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and the shipping was extremely fast!~~5 stars

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!!! My daughter absolutely loves these! I’m so glad I bought them for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cordray

customer_reviews.title: It’s a big size toy
customer_reviews.text: This is for my 4 yr old as a x-mad gift. He loves the Incredibles and he’s going to be excited to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son as he wanted it for Christmas. It is very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: This film is not even out yet and still the toy arrived in poor condition.

customer_reviews.title: The incredibles: Father & Son
customer_reviews.text: Ok Quality, cute action figures of Mr. Incredible and baby Jack-Jack
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Ridgenal

product_meta.title: The Incredibles 2 Mr.Incredible & Jack-Jack Action Figure Pack
product_meta.description: Mr. Incredible and Jack-Jack are ready for some father and son bonding time as they take on anything from a super villain to a raccoon in the backyard. Mr. incredible figure is articulated for maximum flexibility in his full fabric fashion costume, and Jack-Jack has lens eyes. Recommended for Ages: 3+
